title: The minimum front setback from the existing or proposed road / roads shall be as per the following Table No
clause_text: The minimum front setback from the existing or proposed road / roads shall be as per the following Table No.6-B. The minimum side and rear marginal distances shall be as per the following Table No.6-C. For light and ventilation, provisions about interior & exterior chowks shall apply.
section: Front Marginal Distances / Setback / Roadside Margin/s in Congested Area

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The minimum front setback from the existing or proposed road / roads shall be as per the following Table No.6-B.
